of Gehenna

I will do everything in my power to help the teacher. Tell me when you need me. (Hina Sorazaki)
freedom and chaos
+10% yield for cities on continents with your civilization's [ICON_Capital] capital.
cool-headed disciplinary committee
+1 military policy card slot for the current government. +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength to military units on the continent where your civilization's [ICON_Capital] capital is located.
Hina: "It's troublesome. Well, it's something I have to do."

Unique district of Gehenna. Replaces industrial areas. [NEWLINE][ICON_Amenities] +1 comfort, [ICON_Production] +10% production. Additional [ICON_Amenities] +1 Amenity if there is a geothermal vent within city limits.
cool-headed disciplinary committee
[ICON_Strength] Combat Strength +5 on your continent. (Gehenna Ethics Committee)
Hina: "Hina, the disciplinary committee chairperson. I think you know my name.... Nice to meet you." Thank you very much.”
The disciplinary committee invites you to your own city (if you accept, the location of the other country's nearby city will be revealed)
Invited the Disciplinary Committee to your city.
The disciplinary committee proposes a map exchange.
Ako: "Don't think you can go home until it's over, okay?"
Ako: "Um, isn't it a little too close? No, no, it's not like I'm conscious of it..."
Ako: "Please give me some time to think about what kind of feeling this is....I really don't mind a little bit." (The declaration of friendship was refused.)
Chinatsu "When you are afraid of trials, when you are about to give in to hardships, I will stand with you."
Chinatsu: "If you need help, leave it to me!"
Chinatsu: "From here on, it depends on your will." (Refused to declare friendship with the Discipline Committee)
Iori "Don't underestimate the Gehenna Discipline Committee sniper!"
Iori: "Be prepared, you rule-breakers!"
Iori: "Why are there so many troublemakers?"
Iori: "Be prepared, you rule-breakers!"
Iori: "What's with that expression? You're not thinking anything strange, are you?"
Iori: How did this happen?
Iori "It's no use running away!" (Refused to make peace with the Disciplinary Committee)
Iori: How did this happen?
Iori: "I don't want to lose...!" (Peace talks refused)
Hina: "I made an uncharacteristic mistake... I'm sorry, teacher." (The disciplinary committee was defeated.)
Hina: "You let your guard down...?" (The disciplinary committee was defeated.)
Envoy accepted.
Acceptance of envoys was refused.
The disciplinary committee wants to accept envoys.
received envoys.
refused to accept envoys.
Embassies were permitted.
The establishment of an embassy was rejected.
The disciplinary committee is calling for the establishment of an embassy.
Approved the establishment of an embassy.
refused to establish an embassy.
Start alliance negotiations
Hina: "Thank you for being with me... Sensei."
Hina: "I don't really know what to do at a time like this...I'm sorry." (The alliance was refused.)
Hina: "Thank you for being with me... Sensei."
Hina: "I don't really know what to do at a time like this...I'm sorry." (The alliance was refused.)
Borders are allowed to open.
Refused to open borders.

allowed to open borders.
refused to open the border.
It is possible to trade under these conditions.
Transactions are not possible under these conditions.
Transaction completed.
Transaction declined.
The disciplinary committee is satisfied with the terms of the deal.
The disciplinary committee denied the request.
The disciplinary committee accepted the request.
I have accepted the request from the Discipline Committee.
I refused the request from the disciplinary committee.
Fits the disciplinary committee agenda.
Suitable for the disciplinary committee's agenda of "emphasis on culture" (high cultural power)
Fits the disciplinary committee's agenda of "emphasis on happiness" (high comfort)
Fits the disciplinary committee agenda "I love gold" (high income from gold)
Fits the disciplinary committee agenda "heavy industrialist" (high productivity)
Fits the Disciplinary Commission agenda "Allied City-States" (not conflicting over City-State suzerainty)
Fits the disciplinary committee agenda "numberism" (large population)
Fits the disciplinary committee agenda "Technology Advocate" (high science)
Suitable for Disciplinary Committee agenda "standing army" (military strength is high)
Fits into the disciplinary committee agenda "survival of the fittest" (active in war)
Fulfilled the Disciplinary Committee agenda "Spokesperson for great people" (few great people)
Fits the disciplinary committee agenda 'heritage lovers' (less heritage)
Fits into Disciplinary Commission agenda "Protector of City-States" (active in protecting City-States)
Fits into Disciplinary Commission agenda "Protector of City-States" (active in protecting City-States)
Fits the disciplinary committee agenda "air power" (high air power)
Fits into Disciplinary Commission agenda "Protector of City-States" (active in protecting City-States)
Fits Disciplinary Commission agenda "Civilized Nation" (Repels Barbarian Encampment)
Fits into the disciplinary committee agenda 'environmentalists' (enthusiastic about nature conservation and building national parks)
Fits the disciplinary committee agenda "developer" (enthusiastic about logging and terrain improvement)
Fits the disciplinary committee agenda "ideological constitution" (same government)
Consistent with the disciplinary committee's agenda "New Happy" (proactive in the use of nuclear weapons)
Fits the disciplinary committee's agenda "Piety" (high faith)
Appropriate for Disciplinary Committee agenda "Explorer" (low map completion)
Consistent with the disciplinary committee's "paranoia" agenda (lack of military power and territorial expansion drive)
It went against the disciplinary committee's agenda.
Contrary to the disciplinary committee's agenda "emphasis on culture" (low cultural power)
Contrary to the disciplinary committee's agenda "Focus on happiness" (low comfort)
Contrary to Disciplinary Committee agenda "I love gold" (low income from gold)
Contrary to Disciplinary Committee agenda "Allied City-States"
Contrary to the Disciplinary Committee agenda "Heavy Industryist" (low productivity)
Contrary to the disciplinary committee's agenda "numberism" (low population)
Contrary to Disciplinary Committee agenda "Technologists" (low science)
Contrary to the disciplinary committee agenda "standby army" (military strength is low)
Contrary to the disciplinary committee's agenda "paranoia" (high military power and territorial expansion motivation)
Contrary to the disciplinary committee agenda "Spokesperson for Great People" (many great people)
Contrary to the disciplinary committee agenda 'heritage lovers' (lots of heritage)
Contrary to Disciplinary Commission agenda "Protector of city-states" (does not protect city-states)
Contrary to Disciplinary Commission agenda "Protector of city-states" (does not protect city-states)
Contrary to the disciplinary committee agenda "air power" (low air power)
Contrary to Disciplinary Commission agenda "Protector of city-states" (does not protect city-states)
Violating the Disciplinary Committee agenda "civilized nations" (leaving barbarian camps unattended)
Against the disciplinary committee agenda 'environmentalists' (destroying nature)
Contrary to the disciplinary committee's agenda "developmentalist" (enthusiastic about nature conservation)
It went against the disciplinary committee's agenda "ideological constitution" (different government)
Contrary to the disciplinary committee's agenda "New Happy" (negative against nuclear attack)
Goes against Disciplinary Committee agenda "Piety" (low Faith)
Goes against Disciplinary Committee agenda 'Explorer' (high map completion)
The disciplinary committee has promised you not to settle near the border.
The disciplinary committee will ignore the warning and continue colonization activities near the border.
The disciplinary committee has promised you not to take military action.
The disciplinary committee ignores the warning and waits for an opportunity for military action.
The disciplinary committee has promised you not to send spies.
The disciplinary committee ignores the warning and plans to continue spying.
The disciplinary committee has promised you not to steal treasures.
The disciplinary committee will ignore the warning and continue to loot treasure.
The disciplinary committee has promised you to stop proselytizing.
The disciplinary committee will ignore the warning and continue its missionary work.
The Disciplinary Committee wants you to promise: Do not settle near our borders.
I made a promise with the disciplinary committee.
I refused my promise.
The Disciplinary Committee wants you to promise: Do not attack with troops near the border.
I made a promise with the disciplinary committee.
The disciplinary committee wants you to make the following promises: Do not send spies.
I made a promise with the disciplinary committee.
I refused my promise.
The Disciplinary Committee wants you to promise the following: Do not loot treasures.
I made a promise with the disciplinary committee.
I refused my promise.
The Disciplinary Committee wants you to make the following commitments: Stop missionary work.
I made a promise with the disciplinary committee.
I refused my promise.
The disciplinary committee wants the alliance to continue.
I have agreed to continue the alliance with the Disciplinary Committee.
Refused to continue the alliance with the Disciplinary Committee.
The continuation of the alliance has been accepted.
The continuation of the alliance was refused.
Consistent with the disciplinary committee's "gossip" agenda (proactive in declaring friendship, opening borders, sending envoys, and establishing embassies)
Contrary to the disciplinary committee's agenda "gossip" (reluctant to declare friendship, open borders, dispatch envoys, establish embassies)
Fulfilled the disciplinary committee's agenda of "following" (meaning a golden age)
Violating the disciplinary committee's agenda to "follow" (falling into the Dark Ages)
Fulfilled the disciplinary committee agenda "Humanist" (fallen into the dark ages)
Violating the Disciplinary Committee's agenda of "humanists" (meaning a golden age)
Fits the disciplinary committee agenda "territorial expansionist" (large territory)
Contrary to the disciplinary committee agenda "territorial expansionist" (small territory)
Appropriate for Disciplinary Committee agenda ``flat Earth theorists'' (negative in the space race)
Contrary to the disciplinary committee's agenda "Flat Earth Theorist" (active in the space race)
Fits the Disciplinary Commission agenda "Great White Fleet" (Navy is strong)
Contrary to Disciplinary Commission agenda "Great White Fleet" (weak navy)
Fits the disciplinary committee agenda "demagogue" (low diplomatic support)
Contrary to the disciplinary committee agenda "demagogue" (high diplomatic support)
Appropriate for the disciplinary committee's agenda of "Tourism Nation" (low tourism power)
Contrary to the disciplinary committee's agenda of "Tourism Nation" (High tourism power)
Fits the disciplinary committee agenda "religious intolerance" (same religion)
Violating the disciplinary committee agenda "religious intolerance" (different religion)
Fits the Disciplinary Committee agenda "Libertarian" (fewer diplomatic victory points)
Contrary to the Disciplinary Committee agenda "Libertarian" (more diplomatic victory points)
Fits the disciplinary committee agenda "looters" (lots of looted tiles)
Goes against the Disciplinary Commission agenda "Pillagers" (fewer tiles looted)
Meets Disciplinary Commission agenda "Bear Enclosure" (not conquering another civilization's capital)
Violating the Disciplinary Committee agenda "Bear Enclosure" (conquering another civilization's capital)
Fits the Discipline Committee agenda "zealots" (belongs to a religion founded by the disciplinary committee)
Contrary to the Disciplinary Committee agenda "Zealists" (not following the religion founded by the Disciplinary Committee)
Fits the disciplinary committee agenda "miser" (high gold income)
Goes against the Disciplinary Committee agenda "Miserable" (less gold income)
